survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Fitness Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the quality, usage, and satisfaction levels with on-site fitness facilities to improve workplace wellness programs.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the on-site fitness facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity. This helps track frequency of usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use the on-site fitness facilities?

questions.question_text: What types of equipment or facilities do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Helps identify popular amenities.

script.question_text: What types of equipment or facilities do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the fitness facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for nuanced feedback. Mobile-friendly design recommended.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the fitness facilities?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site fitness facilities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site fitness facilities?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in additional wellness programs (e.g., nutrition workshops, mental health sessions)?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice to gauge interest in expanding wellness offerings.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in additional wellness programs (e.g., nutrition workshops, mental health sessions)?
